Package ORM.Annotations

Annotation Type Column

@Target(FIELD)
@Retention(RUNTIME)
public @interface Column
Custom annotation to classify class fields as database columns.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
    boolean autoIncrement
    Auto incrementation attribute for column-annotated class fields.
    boolean ignore
    Ignore attribute for column-annotated class fields.
    int length
    Length attribute for column-annotated class fields.
    boolean nullable
    Nullable attribute for column-annotated class fields.
    boolean primary
    Primary key attribute for column-annotated class fields.
    boolean unique
    Unique attribute for column-annotated class fields.

  • Element Details

    • primary

      boolean primary
      Primary key attribute for column-annotated class fields.
      Returns:
      default false or true if set to it in annotation declaration.
      Default:
      false

    • autoIncrement

      boolean autoIncrement
      Auto incrementation attribute for column-annotated class fields.
      Returns:
      default false or true if set to it in annotation declaration.
      Default:
      false

    • unique

      boolean unique
      Unique attribute for column-annotated class fields.
      Returns:
      default false or true if set to it in annotation declaration.
      Default:
      false

    • nullable

      boolean nullable
      Nullable attribute for column-annotated class fields.
      Returns:
      default false or true if set to it in annotation declaration.
      Default:
      true

    • length

      int length
      Length attribute for column-annotated class fields. Only makes sense to set if the column is a var type in database which length can be customized.
      Returns:
      default (int) 255 or other length if set to it in annotation declaration.
      Default:
      255

    • ignore

      boolean ignore
      Ignore attribute for column-annotated class fields. Used for class fields that will have a relation to other objects in a class but don't need a foreign key entry on their own database table (1:1, 1:n).
      Returns:
      default false or true if set to it in annotation declaration.
      Default:
      false
